features: Check Your Drawer Dimensions: This product is suitable for drawers with an inner size larger than 16.7"D x 12.3"W and a height greater than 2.1"

Hold Various Knives: Item dimensions 16.6"D x 12.2"W x 2"H, up to 16 knives and 1 knife sharpener (Not Included), 8 slots for 9.45" steak knives, another 8 slots for 15.7" knives and middle slot for the sharpening steel

Carved Grooves and Angled Handle Support: Enough space for fingers to grab the knives easily; Larger Knives don’t shoot out the back of the knife block and hit against your drawer even if slammed; It also ensures that knives tip do not point up

Keep Knives Neat/Organized Drawer: Store your knife sets in drawer with our knife holder to keep knives sharp, organized and out of sight; Well-carved slots ensure easy retrieval while securely holding each knife in place

Elegant Design and Durable Material: The cutlery holder is made of premium-quality, sustainable moso bamboo; The natural grain gives it a distinct design. Moso is ultra-durable and not chip, scratch or fade easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Well-Made and Looks Nice
reviews.reviewText: This knife block is great. It fits well in any size drawer. Not too tall. Our knives are well-organized now. No problem getting the knives in the slots. Hold lots of knives. It's looks really nice. The price is well worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife holder
reviews.reviewText: Definitely would recommend. Good size, well made, makes it very convenient having all cutting knives easily accessible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this and our knives got perfectly in it.!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Easy to clean" I dunno
reviews.reviewText: What a weird question. But with knife blocks, the problem I've always had is, you can't clean those things.Enter THIS. It just slides into your drawer. There's plenty of space for all kinds of knives, from chef's knives to utility knives. There are spaces to accommodate various knives.I have had this now for two years, and apologize for not having reviewed this until now. It's really solid, and protects your knives. It really is an excellent piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great organizing tool
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure about this but really wanted to free up counter space and get rid of the standard knife block. This is a really great alternative. If you have one of the new big/wide drawers I paired it with the expandable utensil organizer and they fit perfectly and make me feel much more together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good drawer knife storage for the money.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this after seeing a recommendation on Reddit. I’ve been looking for a way to get my knife block off the counter and away from my toddler.While this knife holder is pretty big, I wish it was slightly larger for my drawers. My other complaint is that it doesn’t hold some of my longer knifes like a carving knife.I’ve used the smaller slots for pairing and petty knives so I’m still looking for a better storage solution for steak knives.I’m also curious about how the bamboo will affect the knife edges and sharpness but no complaints yet.Overall, good value for the money and a proof of concept so far. It may lead to a custom number later on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful storage unit for knives
reviews.reviewText: Replaced old bamboo knife storage unit. This one is sturdier, beautiful, and holds more knives than my old one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love that it’s off the counter
reviews.reviewText: Instead of a knife block on the counter, this is nicely tucked away and still efficient. Good quality, love how it looks in my drawer. Great purchase.
This product is awesome. All of my knives fit and it cleared off lots of counter space! Very well made, great quality. Super happy!
Articoli bello e funzionalissimo.Il cassetto è ordinato e i coltelli sono tutti posizionati, ben visibili ed in sicurezza. Lo consiglio!!
Köpte D.Perlla Knife Set, 16 ST setet tillsammans med denna och det passade bra ihop. Sitter fint i lådan.
Hochwertige Verarbeitung..Absolut perfekt für meine Messer..Hebt die Wertigkeit der Messer nochmal..Zudem habe ich noch Platz für noch mehr Messer 🔪 😅😅

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product! Healthy and looks super neat and premium
